name: Steel handlebar taper/widening
description:
If you have out grown your steel handlebars but dont want to replace them just yet then having the height and/or width increase can give them a new lease of life.
Standard or oversized bars can be extended to your chosen measurements.
We use T45 steel tubing for the down tube and handlebar and have a 3" overlap on the taper.
Paint/powder coat will be removed in the area.
If you require both processes (wider and taller) then put '2' in the quantity option. Add the dimensions you require at the checkout 'note to merchant section'.
PLEASE NOTE
Overly extending handlebars can cause premature failure, breakage or bending.
Mr. H is not responsible for this.

name: Mr. H HIC T45 Clamp
description:
Another super tough T45 product tested by Luke Painter. Allowing no less than 6 months testing Luke was unable to destroy or damage this clamp. After 5 prototypes we have the strongest fabricated clamp we could create. 
Made from T45 tubing and steel bosses, hand brazed, M8 bolts for max strength and powdercoated in eye catching metallic black it provides an alternative to the usual machined aluminium clamps that dominate the market.

name: Mr. H - O.G Beast Standard Bars
description:
The newest addition to the Mr. H scooter bars line up.

Using the same proven formula of ultra strong T45 steel tubing with hand brazed joints but this time with a standard size down tube and curved gusset.

The standard sized down tube is compatible with SCS and ICS compression systems. 
The curved gusset provides a massive increase in bend resistance ensuring these bars provide maximum strength but also offers a smooth hand friendly area to catch a wayward barspin.

Each set of bars are grit blasted and finished in a super tough "ChromaFlake" clear metallic powdercoat.

The Mr. H O.G Beast bars weigh just 1.1kg in 20"x20" size.

Available sizes are: 
20" x 20" 
20" x 22"

All bars are sold without a slit, if you require a slit for ICS please specify this in the 'Note To Merchant' section.
 
All scooter bars, unless collected from the factory, will cost £7.50 for delivery via courier next working day if ordered and paid for by 1.00pm (UK Only).


For international shipping please Contact Mr. H prior to purchasing.

name: Mr. H-LP.1
description:
Mr. H-LP.1

The original Mr. H bars, developed, tried and tested over three years with Luke Painter for maximum strength and durability. 

Each set of LP.1 bars are individually hand brazed using oxy/acetylene gas torch and brass rods. 

All bars are constructed from T45 steel tubing with a 7 inch Vee gusset. Each set of bars are grit blasted and finished in a super tough "ChromaFlake" clear powdercoat. 

Available sizes are:
20" x 20" 
20" x 22"

All bars come with slits and are HIC compatible.

All scooter bars are £7.50 delivered by courier next working day if ordered and paid for by 1.00pm (UK Only).

For international shipping please Contact Mr. H prior to purchasing.

name: Mr. H-IG.1
description:
Mr. H-IG.1

The IG.1 was developed to give the same strength and durability as the LP.1 but with an old school super clean look. 

Each set of IG.1 bars are individually hand brazed using  oxy/acetylene gas torch and brass rods. 

All bars are constructed from T45 steel tubing with a 7 inch internal gusset that is pressed into the crossbar and brazed into place.

Each set of bars are grit blasted and finished in a super tough "ChromaFlake" clear powdercoat. 

Available sizes: 
20" x 20"
20" x 22"

All bars come with slits and are HIC compatible.

All scooter bars are £7.50 delivered by courier next working day if ordered and paid for by 1.00pm (UK Only).

For international shipping please Contact Mr. H prior to purchasing.

name: Mr. H-Custom Made Bars
description:
Mr. H-Custom Made Bars

Mr. H offers the opportunity to have bars custom made to your size requirements. 

Each set of bars will be hand made to the customers dimensions in either LP.1. I.G1 or O.G Beast spec.

Please Email with confirmed choice of bars and dimensions in inches of width and height and any other requirements you have.
All HIC bars are sold with a slit but a standard size tube can be provided at (free) if you wish to run SCS.

Custom bars are usually shipped within 10 working days from payment date.

Please make absolutely sure of the dimensions sent in for custom bars as alteration to sizes will be charged for at the rate of another set of bars. 

Any further questions please Email.

All scooter bars are £7.50 delivered (UK Only).

For international shipping please Contact Mr H. prior to purchasing.

name: Mr. H HIC Kit
description:
Mr. H  HIC Kit

Hidden Internal Compression kit, developed to work perfectly with Mr. H bars and most other oversized bars with an internal dimension of 1 1/4 inches (31.75mm). 

It is recommended that you check your forks and headset for compatibility as this kit does not use a star nut but instead uses a long bolt that passes through the forks and up through to the top cap.                                                  

Star nuts can be used if needed but a shorter bolt will have to be used. (Not provided)

Once the HIC kit is installed it will provide a super strong and hassle free compression that is suitable for the most hardcore use.

Kit includes:

HIC Shim with top hat (87mm)
M8 200mm Compression Bolt (High tensile 12.9)
Undersized top cap
Nyloc nut
Large washer
Mr. H Sticker

£3.00 - Royal Mail 1st class delivery

For international shipping please Contact Mr. H prior to purchasing.

name: Mr. H Stunt Pegs
description:
Mr. H Stunt Pegs

Mr. H stunt stainless steel pegs are built tough!! 

Developed with Luke Painter as chief tester of all Mr. H products it was decided that these pegs would be manufactured from stainless steel. 

They offer maximum strength and durability and massively reduced wear rates compared to aluminium. 

These pegs are also loved by Lewis William of Scoot-Mag who recommends theses pegs for the "chink....swiiiiish" noise they make while grinding a rail or coping!! 

All pegs are sold with a high tensile (12.9) axle kit, including washers and nyloc nuts.

For international shipping please Contact Mr. H prior to purchasing.

name: Mr. H Contrast Pullover Hoodie (TAF)
description:
Mr. H Contrast Pullover Hoodie (TAF)

Heavy weight and extra warm with a large double layer hood.

•	Weight 340gsm    
•	Hidden MP3/Phone pocket inside front pouch pocket with small opening for earphone feed       
•	 Contrast draw cords, eyelets and taped neck line
•	50% Cotton/50% Polyester                              
•	Front pouch pocket
•	Elasticated Cuffs and waistband
•	Five Thread Stitching                                                                                                                                                  
•	Side panels with five thread stitching        
•	Hidden earphone loops
•	Two panel double fabric hood with contrast inner

£3.50 - Royal Mail 1st class delivery

For international shipping please Contact Mr. H prior to purchasing.


Only available in grey/blue at the moment.


Sizes:

XS		to fit		34 inch chest
S		to fit		36 inch chest
M		to fit		38 inch chest
L		to fit		40/42 inch chest
XL		to fit		44/46 inch chest

name: Tough as F*ck T-Shirt
description:
Mr H - Tough as F*ck T-Shirt

name: Scoot-Mag
description:
Scoot-Mag

Freestyle Scooter Riding has grown massively in the last couple of years and we want to see it continue to do so. 

We want to push the sport as it is something that we love and are passionate about. It is great to see something that pushes boundaries and to be part of something that is growing and developing so rapidly. 

Scooter riding is a progressive, modern sport that we believe is really exciting with people like Terry Price and Ryan Williams achieving new tricks for the first time. It is great fun and we want to be part of it and share our passion with as many people as we can.

£1.50 - Royal Mail 1st class delivery

For international shipping please Contact Mr. H prior to purchasing.
